name: cube game (hardcore)
description:
-the game is one very long level

-this game is a hardcore game (one life)

-no checkpoints

-you have only 8 health points 

-you can't restore health points

-this game is just for fun/challenge so don't take it seriously :)

controls:

a = left

d = right

space = jump

hold space on walls = clamp

i think this is all you need to know about the game for now

i hope you enjoy this simple  game

and i really want to see your reaction while you play it (if possible).

and i wish to everyone a great lovely day :)
